description: Building off the existing Linux support for GPU Direct RDMA / Peer-To-Peer DMA functionality, a set of patches were posted by NVIDIA today enabling this P2P DMA support to also work for device-private pages...
title: NVIDIA Posts Linux Patches For GPU Direct RDMA For Device Private Pages

description: Back in March for GDC, Microsoft excitingly announced the official releases of Direct3D 12 Work Graphs for "enabling new types of GPU autonomy" for allowing more rendering work to be offloaded to the GPU. While this greater GPU-driven rendering with Work Graphs has been talked up by Microsoft and other parties, Valve engineers working on VKD3D-Proton for implementing D3D12 over Vulkan have found the new Work Graphs functionality to not be as nearly captivating...
title: VKD3D-Proton Has Been Working On Emulating D3D12 Work Graphs, But The Tech Disappoints

description: Intel and AMD have jointly announced the creation of an x86 ecosystem advisory group to bring together the two companies as well as other industry leaders -- both companies and individuals such as Linux creator Linus Torvalds...
title: Intel & AMD Form An x86 Ecosystem Advisory Group

description: Following last week's release of Ubuntu 24.10, today Canonical announced a developer preview of an Ubuntu 24.10 Linux build targeting Qualcomm Snapdragon X1 Elite laptops...
title: Ubuntu 24.10 Developer Preview Released For Snapdragon X1 Elite Laptops

description: LLVM's modern Fortran compiler "flang-new" has now been renamed to "flang" for next year's LLVM 20 update...
title: LLVM's Modern "Flang-New" Fortran Compiler Renamed To "Flang"

description: Solus 4.6 is out as the newest version of this popular desktop Linux distribution that is known for its default Budgie desktop while also shipping with other desktop options...
title: Solus 4.6 Released With Continued Merged Usr Migration, Experimental Software Centers

description: Intel engineers have released the oneAPI Deep Neural Network Library "oneDNN" version 3.6 release that serves as the building blocks for deep learning software like ONNX Runtime, OpenVINO, Apache MXNet, Apache SIGNA, and optionally by PyTorch and TensorFlow with Intel's extensions...
title: Intel oneDNN 3.6 Improves Performance For Granite Rapids, Initial Xe2 Optimizations

description: It's been a while since we have seen anything new to report on Unvanquished as one of the few remaining and promising open-source game projects. The Unvanquished FPS/RTS game has been in development for 12 years now and built atop the Daemon engine that is now a very distant fork from the id Tech 3 engine. The latest now is that Unvanquished has been pushing forward OpenGL 4.6 rendering support...
title: Unvanquished Working On OpenGL 4.6 Renderer Support

description: While ARM-based SoCs with Simultaneous Multi-Threading (SMT) aren't too common, there do exist some such as select models of the Huawei Kunpeng server SoC with SMT or there HiSilicon Kirin 9000S. As such Huawei/HiSilicon engineers have been working to expose SMT controls on ARM64 for the Linux kernel...
title: ARM64 SMT Control Patches Updated For The Linux Kernel

description: The OpenBSD project has released LibreSSL 4.0 as the newest version of this open-source TLS implementation that was forked from OpenSSL a decade ago...
title: LibreSSL 4.0 Released With EmScripten Support, Fixes Windows Support Past Y2038
